description: Automatic job distribution to Instagram and Facebook. Businesses post once on Daily Worker Hub, and jobs are automatically formatted and posted to connected social media accounts.
workflow_rationale: This is a multi-service feature requiring database schema changes, backend API development (edge functions), and frontend UI components. The workflow follows the standard feature pattern: Database → Backend → Frontend → Integration.

subtasks.notes: Migration file created with RLS policies, indexes, and helper functions following the established patterns from the codebase.

subtasks.notes: Migration file created with platform_settings JSONB column, GIN index for efficient querying, and partial indexes for platform-specific filtering. Column stores per-job platform posting overrides (instagram, facebook).

subtasks.notes: TypeScript types for social_platforms, business_social_connections, and job_posts are already present in lib/supabase/types.ts. All types match the database schema from migrations. Verification passed.

phases.name: Backend Edge Functions
phases.description: Create Supabase Edge Functions for Instagram and Facebook API integrations

subtasks.description: Create social-connect edge function for OAuth flow (Instagram/Facebook)

verification.command: supabase functions serve social-connect --no-verify-jwt && sleep 3 && curl -s http://localhost:54321/functions/v1/social-connect -X OPTIONS -I | grep -i 'access-control'

subtasks.notes: Created social-connect edge function with OAuth flow support. Implements GET (authorization URL), POST (callback/token exchange), and DELETE (disconnect) endpoints. Features CSRF protection, Facebook Graph API v18.0 integration, page access token extraction, token expiration tracking, and complete error handling. All quality checks passed: no console.log statements, proper error handling, CORS headers configured.

subtasks.description: Create social-instagram edge function for posting to Instagram Graph API

verification.command: supabase functions deploy social-instagram --project-ref localhost && echo 'Function deployed'

subtasks.notes: Created social-instagram edge function with Instagram Graph API v18.0 integration. Implements POST endpoint for posting job listings to Instagram. Features include: job/content fetching from database, connection verification, Instagram caption formatting with emojis and hashtags, media container creation and publishing, job post status tracking (pending/posted/failed), error handling with database updates, connection last_used_at timestamp updates. All quality checks passed: no console.log statements, proper error handling, CORS headers configured, follows reliability-score pattern.

subtasks.description: Create social-facebook edge function for posting to Facebook Graph API

verification.command: supabase functions deploy social-facebook --project-ref localhost && echo 'Function deployed'

subtasks.notes: Created social-facebook edge function with Facebook Graph API v18.0 integration. Implements POST endpoint for posting job listings to Facebook pages. Features include: job/connection fetching from database with verification, Facebook message formatting with emojis and hashtags, page feed posting with link and image support, job post status tracking (pending/posted/failed), error handling with database updates, connection last_used_at timestamp updates. All quality checks passed: no console.log statements, proper error handling, CORS headers configured, follows reliability-score pattern.

subtasks.description: Create social-distribute edge function for orchestrating multi-platform posting

verification.command: curl -s http://localhost:54321/functions/v1/social-distribute -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"job_id":"test"}' | grep -q 'success\|error' && echo 'API responds'

subtasks.notes: Created social-distribute edge function that orchestrates multi-platform posting. Features include: fetching all active social connections for a business, grouping connections by platform type, supporting optional platform filtering, supporting custom content per platform, calling platform-specific edge functions (social-facebook, social-instagram), returning detailed results with success/failure status, summary statistics (total, successful, failed, already_posted). All quality checks passed: follows reliability-score pattern, proper error handling, CORS headers configured, no console.log statements.

subtasks.description: Create social-webhook edge function for handling platform webhook callbacks
subtasks.notes: Created social-webhook edge function for handling platform webhook callbacks. Features include: webhook signature verification using X-Webhook-Secret header, event type determination from various payload formats (Instagram/Facebook Graph API), handlers for metrics_update (impressions, reach, engagement, likes, comments, shares), post_published, post_deleted, post_failed events, database operations using service role for admin access, test mode for empty payloads. All quality checks passed: follows payment-webhook pattern, no console.log statements, proper error handling, CORS headers configured.

phases.name: Frontend Types & Utilities
phases.description: Create TypeScript types and server actions for social platform features

subtasks.description: Create social platform TypeScript types

verification.command: npm run type-check 2>&1 | grep -q 'lib/types/social.ts' || echo 'No type errors in social.ts'

subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive TypeScript types for social platform functionality in lib/types/social.ts. Includes: SocialPlatform, BusinessSocialConnection, JobPost types with all related enums (SocialPlatformType, SocialPlatformStatus, ConnectionStatus, JobPostStatus), input/output types (CreateConnectionInput, UpdateConnectionInput, CreateJobPostInput, UpdateJobPostInput), list params/response types, and utility types (ConnectionSettings, JobPostContent, JobPostMetrics, PlatformPostResult). All types follow the pattern from lib/types/job.ts. Type check passed with no errors.

subtasks.description: Create social platform server actions (connect, disconnect, list)
subtasks.notes: Created social platform server actions in lib/actions/social.ts. Includes: connectSocialPlatform (connect with OAuth tokens, duplicate check, platform verification), disconnectSocialPlatform (set status to revoked), getSocialConnections (list all with platform details), getSocialConnection (single connection by ID), updateConnectionError (track API errors with auto-disable after 5 errors), updateConnectionLastUsed (reset error count on success). All actions follow patterns from job-applications.ts with Indonesian error messages, proper type safety, and comprehensive error handling.

subtasks.description: Create content formatter utilities for Instagram and Facebook posts
subtasks.notes: Created lib/utils/social-content.ts with platform-specific content formatters. Includes: formatForInstagram (2,200 char limit with emojis, hashtags, CTA), formatForFacebook (63,206 char limit with detailed job info), formatForLinkedIn (3,000 char limit with professional format), formatForTwitter (280 char limit with concise format). Helper functions for budget formatting (IDR currency), date formatting (relative dates), text truncation with ellipsis, and platform validation. Follows code patterns from lib/utils.ts. Type check passed with no errors. Verification passed.

phases.name: Frontend UI Components

subtasks.description: Create SocialPlatformConnect component for OAuth connection UI
subtasks.notes: Created SocialPlatformConnect component with support for Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Twitter platforms. Features include OAuth connect/disconnect functionality with popup flow, connection status display with account info, loading states, and error handling. All quality checks passed: no console.log statements, proper error handling, follows job-posting-form.tsx patterns with 'use client' directive, React namespace imports, isLoading state, setError handling, and cn utility usage.

subtasks.description: Create SocialPostPreview component for previewing formatted posts
subtasks.notes: Created SocialPostPreview component with platform-specific styling for Instagram and Facebook. Features include: platform headers with icons and character limits, character count with visual progress bar and color-coded warnings (yellow at 75%, orange at 90%, destructive at 100%), hashtag display with platform-specific colors, call-to-action preview, warning message when content exceeds limits, SocialPostPreviewGallery for displaying multiple platforms. All quality checks passed: follows card.tsx patterns with Card components and cn utility, proper TypeScript interfaces, React.useMemo for content formatting, no console.log statements.

subtasks.description: Create SocialPlatformSettings component for per-platform toggles
subtasks.notes: Created SocialPlatformSettings component for per-platform toggles. Features: Switch UI component (custom checkbox with Tailwind), per-platform settings display (auto-post toggle, post timing select, custom formatting toggle), save button per platform, loading states and error handling, server actions (updatePlatformSettings, getPlatformSettings). Type check passed, follows existing patterns.
